post.author: 김유나
post.content:
회사정보
회사명 The Ministry of Attorney General

주소 Canada Ontario  
  720 Bay St., 2nd Fl., Toronto, ON M5G 2K1

홈페이지  

회사소개 Canada Ontario Government.
Court Services Division, Corporate Planning Branch, Ministry of the Attorney General


채용정보
직종 전산직  

직무 IT ANALYSTS

고용형태  

모집기간  Apply by Jan 24, 2003

급여 $1,030 - $1,253 / week

근무지 Canada   Ontario Toronto  


지원자격
학력  

자격증  

경력  

필요한기술 Qualifications: experience in/knowledge of IT hardware including mainframes, micros, local/wide area networking, information architecture, structured programming, Internet technology; experience designing, developing, implementing information-management systems; project-management skills; knowledge of various platforms, standard software, databases; experience evaluating systems, creating technical solutions, developing business cases/service-level agreements.


기타 The Ministry of the Attorney General's court services division seeks experienced individuals to lead and co-ordinate the development and implementation of technical solutions including related activities in support of operations and the rollout of large, complex corporate systems. You will: co-ordinate feasibility studies; participate in developing/implementing IT initiatives; manage infrastructure changes; develop related policies/business cases; participate on working committees; help develop service-level agreements.

Job Reference Number : File AG/CRT-4898



지원방법
지원방법 By Fax  

담당자 David Scott

전화 -- -- -  

팩스번호 416- 326- 1869
post.title: IT ANALYSTS
